ygData.subject: Re: Firey Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: That was changed from beta.  Other classes can use the Firey Avenger.   It was orginially planned for Paladin only but changed ... From: Jynxx
ygData.messageBody:
That was changed from beta. Other classes can use the Firey Avenger. It
was orginially planned for Paladin only but changed
----- Original Message -----
From: Jynxx <Jynxx@...>
To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 31, 1999 2:11 PM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Firey Avenger


> From: "Jynxx" <Jynxx@...>
>
> Ok...first I hate to burst your bubble......The paladins that everyone is
> saying aren't worth playing are the only class that can use this sword.
Oh,
> but do I wish...ahhh....I can dream right? Well if you want to see an
> awesome pic of it go to EQ'Lizer under equipment. It is by far the most
> awe-inspiring sight I have seen so far....next to a guard chasing a giant
> chasing a player. THAT was funny.
>
> Tyveris
>
